channel.title: Changing NPC Drops
channel.description: I wanted to change what goblins drop but no matter what I change in the npcdrops.java files nothing it drops changed. I have only changed code in npcdrops.java Can anyone tell me what I did wrong? my code is below

item.title: Changing NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

I had the same problem. I rewrote everything that has to do with npcs dropping. That would be your best best because you’re probably using a leeched server to begin with.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

You would have to add the drops inside of the .cfg file.

Pure_:

I don’t see how the npc id is being acknowledged.

#NPC name //Organizational purposes
NPCID:RareDropRate? itemID:itemQuantity //Iterates common drops through this line
RareDropID:RareDropQuantity //Iterates rare drops through this line)

Read full topic

item.title: Changing NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I would rewrite your drop system, I don’t see how the npc id is being acknowledged.

Read full topic
